about_the_game:
Pickle Party is a multiplayer party game where up to four players use strategy, sabotage and a lot of luck to come out on top on a game show hosted by Dill Diamond!

Earn power-ups, answer trivia, and play chaotic mini-games ranging from explosive Battle Balls to Go-Karting to Dill's take on pachinko with gravity-defying disks!

Step up and spin the wheel to put your friends in a pickle ... or find yourself in one!

GAME SHOW MODE

Forget the board game mode - in this party game, you’re a contestant on a game show. Take turns spinning the wheel, collecting points, and go for the jackpot for huge point gains!

GAME WHEEL

Every spin of the Game Wheel has an impact on point collection and player performance. Sure, Lady Luck plays a part in winning or losing, but so does good old-fashioned strategy. Power-up items when acquired and used wisely boost your own gameplay while messing with someone else’s.

DILL DIAMOND

No game show would be complete without a memorable host. Meet our loveable yet mischievous host, Dill Diamond. Dill is a trust fund baby and heir to the Diamond Pickle empire. Dill has no desire to be a simple pickle factory owner and is desperate to move out of the shadow of his family’s success and attempts to build his own empire… with varying degrees of success.

POWERUPS

Dill's failed ventures show up as power-ups in the game. Use the Sux-Dillux to steal points and items from other players. Use Ferment N' Fire dill flavoured hot sauce to heat up your competition and prevent them from using items until they cool down. Essence of Dillight is a pickle scented perfume that stinks out your opponents giving you temporary invincibility from other players.

VOICE ACTOR

Dill Diamond is voice recorded in English to provide commentary for players. Enjoy a seamless and immersive gaming experience with professional narration.

GAME SHOW STAPLES

Answer trivia, play Dill or No Dill, and play chaotic mini-games like Dill's take on pachinko in Cosmic Collisions!

MINI-GAMES

Jump into an exciting selection of mini-games, featuring everything from intense races to tricky puzzles. The excitement never stops as each mini-game brings new surprises, sabotages, and competitive fun!

ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Pickle Party allows up to 4 players to compete online.

BOTS

Friends unavailable or just short on players? Pickle Party includes bots so you fill your party to enjoy a game session.

CUSTOMIZATION

Show off your style! Personalize your contestant an outfit to flex on your opponents!

short_description: Step up and spin the wheel in a game show themed party game. Play online with up to 4 frenemies and compete in challenges like trivia questions and mini-games. All while surviving pesky power-ups from opponents and sabotages from the mischievous yet loveable host, Dill Diamond!
